frame.name: Intoxication
frame.definition: <def-root>This frame concerns people being in an altered mental state that is induced by an <fen>Intoxicant</fen>. <ex><fex name="Cognizer">Cory</fex> <m>was</m> <t>drunk</t>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Cognizer">Nutty</fex> stormed in <t>drunk</t> <fex name="Degree">as a fiddler</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Cognizer
FE.definition: <def-root>The mental state of the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is changed by an <fen>Intoxicant</fen> .</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>This Fe identifies the <fen>Degree</fen> to which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is altered by the <fen>Intoxicant</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Evaluation
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Evaluation</fen> indicates the <fen>Cognizer</fen>'s reaction to the intoxicatoin. <ex> <fex name="Cognizer">Jim</fex> had a <fex name="Evaluation">bad</fex> <t>trip</t>. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Duration</fen> of time for which the intoxication holds. <ex> <fex name="Cognizer">Bill</fex> has been <t>sober</t> <fex name="Duration">for 7 months</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Manner</fen> in which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is intoxicated. <ex> <fex name="Cognizer">Michael</fex> was <fex name = "Manner">aggressively</fex> <t>drunk</t>.</ex></def-root>
